com.datamelt.rules.core

Class RuleMessage

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.datamelt.rules.core.RuleMessage
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class RuleMessage
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    this class is used for the messages that are used for a rule. a rule can have a message in case it fails and one in case it passes. message can have placeholders in the text, which will be replaced by real values from the objects in use.
    Author:
    uwe geercken
    See Also:
